abstract: The Walt Disney Company said on Thursday that it had bought Tapulous, a start-up company that makes music-based games for the iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch. Disney said Tapulous’s co-founder and chief operating officer would lead its mobile business.
snippet: The Walt Disney Company said on Thursday that it had bought Tapulous, a start-up company that makes music-based games for the iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch. Disney said Tapulous’s co-founder and chief operating officer would lead its mobile business...
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Company said on Thursday that it had bought Tapulous, a start-up company that makes music-based games for the iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch, The New York Times’s Jenna Wortham reports.

headline.main: Disney Buys Tapulous to Drive Mobile Strategy
